person.persName: Josiah Harris, Jr. (Louisville and Paducah attorney)

body.p: Paducah, Kentucky, attorney. Columbia, Kentucky, native. Son of Josiah Harris, Sr. and Sallie W. King Harris. Married Cora Enders Harris in Paducah in 1861. Father of Hallie Harris. Attended Columbia College in Columbia, Kentucky. Attended Centre College in Danville, Kentucky. Attended law school at the University of Louisville in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1858. Passed the bar in Louisville in 1860. Elected prosecuting attorney of the city courts of Paducah in 1861.
